408510.name: Curious Expedition OST & Artbook
408510.description:
Includes the Original Soundtrack and a 176 page digital Artbook of the Curious Expedition. Buy this exclusive content to support the developer!

The making of Curious Expedition, 176 pages. Foreword by Ron Gilbert and Piotr Iwanicki.


Chapters:
  • Landscape backgrounds
  • Locations
  • Biomes
  • Characters
  • Procedural natives
  • Animals & monsters
  • Visual evolution
  • Field tiles
  • Changelogs & designs
  • Layout evolution
  • Abandoned features
  • Moments of development
  • Alpha updates

Original Soundtrack for the roguelike expedition simulation The Curious Expedition.
Written, arranged, produced and mixed by Alexander Batsch. Mastering by Paul Wilke.


Tracks:
  • 1. Sextant (04:47)
  • 2. Curium (04:33)
  • 3. Anna Karina (04:41)
  • 4. Diaspora (05:51)
  • 5. Electra (05:51)
  • 6. Thelema (06:06)
  • 7. Unia (05:30)
  • 8. Elmsfeuer (05:12)
  • 9. Kemenate (04:08)
  • 9. Sedna (05:14)
  • 9. Permafrost (05:10)
  • 9. Libration (06:08)
408510.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
